channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Inadequate drain, 6th February
item.description:
There is a large volume of water outside the gateway to Brook House. The pavement has deep water there and vehicles driving through the water on the road cause pedestrians to be drenched. The nearest gulley is working but it needs to be repositioned to the lowest point of this part of the road to alleviate this frequent problem
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Shurdington Road, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: State of road now endangering people, 6th February
item.description:
Motorists have now started emergency stopping at 40mph to minimise damage to their vehicles. I almost witnessed a collision today because of this. The potholes are horrendous but there is now an unavoidable trench spanning the entire westbound side of the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Hayden Road, Hesters Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extensive large and deep potholes along stretch of road, 6th February
item.description:
There are dozens of medium-to-large potholes riddled along this lane. Some of them are probably emergency-level depth and this will result in an accident if not fixed immediately, especially considering the narrowness of the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 6th February
item.description:
Please can the road and two mini roundabouts be inspected urgently, there are a vast number of potholes getting deeper and are causing cars to swerve around the two roundabouts. This is a known bad spot, next to a crossing so can cause possible pedestrian safety concerns also. Many thanks
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked, 6th February
item.description:
As you come down the hill it’s on the right at the bottom of the hill outside the garage of 159. He’s a paramedic and parks his car outside sometimes over the drain so will need to informed when you are coming to sort it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 163, Mandarin Way, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
